info.name: Ink for YouTube (add Red accent back+MORE TWEAKS)
info.description:
ABANDONED!!! CHECK MY GITHUB (http://rnbw.in/NQgMT) FOR THE UP-TO-DATE USERCSS (Stylus) VERSION OR INSTALL DIRECTLY: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FaySmash/Ink-for-Google-Reloaded/master/Ink_for_YouTube.user.css

This gives YouTube more color back! It's based on the 'Ink for Google' addon which doesn't work with the new YouTube material design (yet). So I created this userstyle to imitate Ink for Google (hence the name).

You can choose different primary and secondary colors, as well as the searchbox position and menu button display. (More Features in the Stylus Version!)
info.additionalInfo:
Highly recommend to use this userstyle too !!!!!INSTALL/ACTIVATE BEFORE MY USERSTYLE!!!!!:
https://userstyles.org/styles/147347/old-youtube-red-colors

options.label: Centered
